PR Ledakan Komisaris Besar di Internal Polri
07 Nov 2019, 07:00 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Mantan Kapolri Jenderal (Purn) Tito Karnavian cerita soal adanya ledakan Komisaris Besar (Kombes) di internal Polri. Tito mengatakan, selama menjabat sebagai Kapolri 3 tahun 3 bulan, dia menghadapi masalah kenaikan Kombes menjadi Jenderal bintang I. Kini masalah itu jadi PR buat Kapolri baru Idham Azis.
Tito bicara soal ledakan Kombes ini di acara pisah sambut Kapolri di hadapan personel Polri di Mako Brimob, Cimanggis, Depok, Rabu (6/11/2019). Dia meminta maaf apabila ada pihak diinternal Polri yang tidak puas atas kepemimpinannya selama jadi Kapolri.
"Saya hadapi persoalan internal, yaitu ledakan Kombes ini yang berkali-kali saya sampaikan ke teman-teman. Saya nggak tahu ada senior atau tidak, kalau ada senior saya minta maaf kalau ada salah," kata Tito.
Tito mengatakan kondisi ledakan jabatan Komisaris Besar dimulai sejak angkatan '83, '84, hingga '88. Sebelum angkatan itu, kata Tito, jabatan Kombes masih hanya diduduki beberapa orang saja.
"Saya sering bercanda, angkatan paling enak itu angkatan '82, jumlah yang cuma 46 orang, tidur-tidur di rumah dijemput provos, pangkat Kombes disuruh naik bintang, karena jabatan banyak, sementara kombesnya sedikit," ucapnya.
Namun belakangan, lanjut Tito, jabatan Kombes terus bertambahnya mencapai 1.500 orang dan sekitar 400 orang sudah lulus pendidikan tinggi Jenderal. Tito mengakui, permasalahan naik pangkat bintang ini menyita pikiran. Karena itu dia menyerahkan masalah ledakan Kombes ke Idham Azis.
"Angkatan '88 ada lebih 400 yang lulus, nah ini membuat ledakan Kombes, itu yang membuat saya jujur cukup pusing sampai hari ini, dan saya serahkan hal pusing saya ke Pak Idham, iya, karena nggak bisa memuaskan semua orang," ujar Tito.

PR Explosion of Commissioner in Internal Police
Nov 7 2019, 07:00 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Former National Police Chief Gen. (Ret) Tito Karnavian tells about the explosion of the Chief Commissioner (Kombes) in the internal police. Tito said, during his tenure as National Police Chief 3 years and 3 months, he faced the problem of increasing the Kombes to become General Star I. Now the problem was a homework for the new National Police Chief Idham Azis.
Tito talked about the Kombes explosion at a farewell ceremony to welcome the National Police Chief in front of Polri personnel at Mako Brimob, Cimanggis, Depok, Wednesday (11/06/2019). He apologized if there were parties inside the National Police who were dissatisfied with his leadership while he was National Police Chief.
"I face an internal problem, namely the Kombes explosion, which I have repeatedly told friends. I don't know whether there are seniors or not, if there are seniors I apologize if something is wrong," said Tito.
Tito said that the condition of the explosion of the position of Chief Commissioner began in the '83, '84, and '88. Before the force, said Tito, the Senior Commissioner was still occupied by only a few people.
"I often joke, the best force is the '82 force, the number of which is only 46 people, sleeping at home picked up by the provos, the rank of Kombes is told to go up in star, because there are many positions, while the kombes are few," he said.
But lately, continued Tito, the Kombes position continued to grow to reach 1,500 people and around 400 people had graduated from the General Higher Education. Tito admitted, the problem of rising in rank was consuming the mind. Therefore he handed over the issue of the Kombes explosion to Idham Azis.
"Class of '88 there were more than 400 who graduated, well this made the Kombes explosion, it made me honest enough to be dizzy to this day, and I left my headache to Pak Idham, yes, because it couldn't satisfy everyone," said Tito.
